name: Meat Samosa
desc: Crisp deep fried savory pastry pyraminds stuffed with spiced lamb.

name: Tandoori Chicken Half/Full
desc: Baby chicken marinated in yoghurt & special spices & grilled in clay.

name: Sheekh Kebab
desc: Lamb mince blended with ginger, garlic, onion, capsicum and spices

name: Chicken Tikka
desc: Diced chicken breast marinated with yoghurt, ginger, garlic & hot Indian Spices, then cooked in a clay oven.

name: Chicken Lolypop
desc: Popular Indian Chinese cuisine. Chicken lollipop is essentially a Frenched chicken winglet, where in the meat is cut loose from the bone end and pushed down creating a lollipop appearance.

name: Chatpata Pop
desc: Chicken breast marinated in spices and cut into small pieces.

name: Chicken Chilli
desc: Marinated battered chicken chunks fried & cooked with peppers & chilli.

name: Tandoori Chicken Wings
desc: Chicken wings marinated with spices & yoghurt and raosted in clay oven. (8pcs in a portion)

name: Lamb Chops
desc: Marinated in our secret sauce, grilled in day-oven.

name: Juicy Lamb Chilli
desc: Lamb cubes marinated with secret sauce. Cooked in clay oven and rossed in the wok with peppers & onions. (Tender lamb with capsicum, onion and chilli sauce)

name: Mixed Grill
desc: Chicken Tikka, Sheekh Kebab, Spring Lamb Chops and Chicken Wings. Combination of our succulent grills, 3pc each.
